New Records: Paolo Banchero returned after missing 34 games and scored 34 points, contributing with seven rebounds, three assists, and two steals
Key Match Events: Paolo Banchero scored 12 of the final 14 points, nearly turning the game in the Magic's favor
Pre-Game Insights: The Magic was without Jalen Suggs, Gary Harris, and Jett Howard due to injuries
Post-Match Reflections: The Magic dropped to 22-18, just behind the Bucks in the Eastern Conference standings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Magic's strong defensive performance was noted, and their next game is against the Philadelphia 76ers
